scripts.build-dir: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build/components && cp -r public/components build && cp public/index.* build && cp public/favicon.ico build && mkdir -p logs
scripts.babelify: NODE_ENV=production browserify -p esmify build/index.js -g browserify-css -o build/bundle.js
scripts.browserify: NODE_ENV=production browserify build/bundle.js -t envify -t uglifyify --outfile build/main.bundle.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-dir && npm run css && npm run img && npm run babelify && npm run browserify
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-dir && npm run css && npm run img && npm run babelify-dev
scripts.babelify-dev: NODE_ENV=development browserify -p esmify build/index.js -g browserify-css -o build/main.bundle.min.js
